duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all aspects of sales within defined territory for assigned division(s).
Meet/exceed territory sales quota and build/implement an effective territory business/marketing plan.
Participate in all meetings, trade shows, conferences, events, as required by management and submit all required reporting.
Perform all responsibilities in a professional, courteous, and efficient manner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Communication, Marketing or related field, with 2 years of wholesale footwear territory sales experience
